definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="amplifier">amplifier</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:MarkedCounter</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execution</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:MarkedCounter</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
